strings.Value: "Curses! How did you get it into your head that I hate everyone?! I'm just making sure everyone does everything right — for the sake of everyone else. For our cause! And what do I get in return?"

"Me, thinking that you hate everyone? Ha, what nonsense! I know full well that you don't care one whit about anyone besides yourself. And you couldn't care less about our cause — you just like to point out people's mistakes so you can feel superior."
